for BRP
all of our vehicles produced in Canada
and Mexico are usmca compliant and are

Levi by the United States on these

the exposure is mostly limited to our
PNA business so with what we know today
the tariffs that are currently in effect
would have an estimated impact of about

as is throughout the year but as you
well know the situation remains very
fluid and we are continuously refining

our tier 2 and tier three
suppliers this this brings us to
discussion about what to expect for
fiscal 6 on slide
17 as we already mentioned with the
